pr_title: Change the way ConnectorStatistics is added to the Servers Connectors

timeline.message:
Change the way ConnectorStatistics is added to the Servers Connectors

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

timeline.author: gregw

replies.bodyText:
The method currently takes a Connection.Listener so what about addListenerToAllConnectors()?
Or should I generalise it to addBeanToAllConnectors(Object o).
replies.author: lachlan-roberts

replies.bodyText: I think the impl just does an addBean, so addBeanToAllConnectors(Object) is best.   If I missed something and it is about Listeners, then `addListenerToAllConnectors(Listener)
replies.author: gregw

timeline.bodyText:
@gregw changing this to addBeanToAllConnectors will make this javadoc irrelevant.
Maybe it is worth keeping it as a Listener method to keep this documentation around, it doesn't seem obvious that adding a Listener as a bean on a connector would add it for all new connections. Only other place I can see this mentioned is the javadoc for ConnectionStatistics which doesn't seem the right place.
timeline.author: lachlan-roberts
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -265,6 +266,19 @@ public void setConnectors(Connector[] connectors)
             _connectors.addAll(Arrays.asList(connectors));
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Add a {@link Connection.Listener} as a bean to all connectors on the server, this
+     * will register the listener with all connections accepted by the connectors.
+     * @param listener the listener to be added.
